content:
Kickstart your health app - presented by one of the authors of one of the opensource FHIR/SMART libraries
○ A practical introduction for developing a SMART on FHIR app
○ Overview of the sandboxes available
○ Overview of the opensource libraries / tools available.
Existing, successful SMART on FHIR app - presented by one of the expert app developers (Polyglot, RxREVU, etc)

Real-world needs for apps - presented by health system CIO, CMIO, etc
○ What are the current and future needs where apps can solve real-world problems for patients and providers?

Hackathon component? Or app contest ending in audience judging over the course of the conference?
○ Winning app gets x
○ Apps present.
